channel.title: Meetup on Marcus Vechiato
channel.description: Recent content in Meetup on Marcus Vechiato

item.title: Reflecting on My Presentation at the London SRE Meetup
item.description: I recently had the wonderful opportunity to present at the London SRE Meetup, and I’m excited to share the experience with you all. The presentation, titled “Working Together: SRE and Platform Engineering,” focused on the synergy between site reliability engineering and platform engineering to enhance operational efficiencies and reliability. I am pleased to have engaged with so many knowledgeable professionals and enthusiasts who are passionate about improving systems and operations.
